features: Softens And Hydrates - Our conditioner hydrates and softens your hair without harsh ingredients
Made With Real Essential Oil - Our conditioner uses essential oils and contains no artificial fragrance
Forest Mint Scent - Our signature scent features a blend of Peppermint Oil, Tea Tree Oil & Eucalyptus Oil
For All Hair Types - Perfect for curly, straight, thinning, thick, dry or oily hair
Made In Small Batches - Means a fresher conditioner with fresher ingredients

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Get Better Looking Hair A great hair conditioner will soften your hair and further hydrate and protect it after shampooing. Maximize your hair care routine with our essential oil infused men's daily use conditioner.
Inspired by Nature Our conditioner is made using only the best ingredients like real eucalyptus, tea tree and peppermint essential oil and contains no artificial fragrance.

Men's Grooming Inspired by Nature Hydrate Your Head and Hair Eucalyptus, Peppermint & Tea Tree essential oil contain properties to keep your head and hair looking and feeling great after shampooing. Nutrient-Rich Ingredients Whether your hair is curly, thin, oily, fine, or greying, an unhealthy scalp can lead to dandruff, flaking and damaged hair. Our conditioner won't dry out your hair and scalp. Works on All Hair and Scalp Types Whether your hair is long or short, curly or straight, our conditioner penetrates to the roots to give you stronger, better looking hair.

Crafted in Small Batches to Ensure Maximum Freshness and Quality We take product quality very seriously, which is why we create our conditioner in small batches to ensure our products adhere to the highest level of quality. Our frequent production runs mean you receive a conditioner that contains only the freshest ingredients.
Trusted & Used Daily by 200,000+ Men Rocky Mountain Barber Company products are trusted and used daily by professional and amateur athletes, outdoor adventurists and awesome people just like you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this conditioner
reviews.reviewText: Very creamy and minty. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is pretty great. My hair has been pretty dry and abused throughout my life. This stuff seems to be doing the trick. It's the right consistency, not watery like other products, and it smells incredible. Most importantly, my hair feels soft and bouncy, which is something I've never really felt before from other big name brand conditioners. I'll definitely be buying this again (in a larger size).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells great and works really well!
reviews.reviewText: I like this conditioner a lot. Not only does it smell great, but it seems to work really well. I've only started using it, so I am not 100% sure if it will be itch free yet - so far so good! As others have said, the bottle is pretty small compared to products you might buy in store; however, you don't need to use a huge amount. I would recommend trying it out for yourself!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perhaps one of the illest men's conditioners
reviews.reviewText: Yeah it's a small bottle but it's certainly not the...uhmmm...size that matters. It only takes a small amount of this product to do the trick and it'll leave your hair quite soft. I don't use any styling implements so I was satisfied with how my hair feathered back nicely after combing. The smell is nice in the moment and doesn't really linger which is fine, mint and eucalyptus are an awesome combined fragrance but I suspect an overload might turn one into the fabled "aromatic man." Five stars to a tee. This stuffs chic, y'all. A minty fresh experience that leaves your hair as soft as a forest creatures... unless they've been up to mischief.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must try for any guy!!!
reviews.reviewText: First reviewed on: 06/06/2020--------------------------I had decided to purchase this conditioner after using the shampoo for approximately a month with happy results.If anyone is looking for a natural conditioner/ and shampoo I would definitely recommend this brand.Pro: - The smell is manly without being overbearing. - This conditioner really makes your hair much softer and sleeker. I was amazed on how soft my hair was with just the shampoo, but this makes it even better using both.- This product is made in Canada.Cons: - The bottle For the conditioner only comes in a(n) 8oz bottle.- The price per ounce is more than if buying a cheaper quality product that is not made from natural ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good quality torture
reviews.reviewText: The fumes alone burn my eyes every time. And it’s not good bang for buck

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Look no further
reviews.reviewText: I occasionally get dandruff, and it usually goes away but it had got pretty bad this time. I don't ever normally use conditioner but I decided I would time. Luckily I stumbled upon this bottle and decided to try it based off the good reviews and they don't lie. Only been using for a few days and my dry flaky scalp has about 2/3 the dandruff as before, and not only that but my hair actually looks and feels so much softer/fuller and heavier. I also have a super sensitive scalp and this hasn't irritated it all. Smells great too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been looking for something with a good tingle like American Crew Simulating Conditioner had before it was discontinued and this is the best I've found so far.
I bought this conditioner to use it for cleaning my hair and keeping its oil. It did a great job and i have no complains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Left me with dandruff the first few times and was almost painful. But after the first few times then it is great.

reviews.reviewTitle: Tingle your Scalp and Smells Awesome
reviews.reviewText: Great Product, Amazing scent, very nice cooling and tingling sensation but a little pricey. Won't be daily used just because of price but maybe once a week. Great scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It’s quite a good conditioner, but the review that said it stings because of too much mint (or something) is spot on.First time I used it, my forehead felt like it was burning so much I might actually have damage to my skin (I didn’t, but it was pretty uncomfortable!).Otherwise, it’s ok if a bit overpriced.
This product seams to be helping my itchy scalp. You can actually feel it tingling when you apply it. Has a cool feeling to it. Great scent as well.
